=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Taking Stock: Market fails to hold on to day#39;s gains, ends marginally higher
Source: Moneycontrol - Markets
Published: 2024-04-23 10:16
Related Stocks: HCLTECH, SUNPHARMA, RELIANCE, BHARTIARTL, MARUTI
Categories: markets

Summary:
Grasim Industries, Bharti Airtel, Nestle India, Maruti Suzuki and HCL Technologies were the biggest Nifty gainers, while losers included Sun Pharma, BPCL, Reliance Industries, MM and Hindalco Industries

Sentiment: positive
